title: Weleda Skin Food, 2.5 Ounce
description: Dry, rough skin of any age gets indulgent moisture with this intensively nourishing, deeply hydrating cream. it’s a unique, ultra-rich whole-body cream that deeply hydrates, restores and protects your skin. deeply moisturized and protected, your skin looks soft and supple with a healthy glow.

title: Kent Hand-Made 25mm Wet/Thick Coarse Hair Large Handled Rake Comb - 10T
description:
This comb is faux tortoishell, hand polished to glide through the hair without causing damage or scratching the scalp.


Handmade 200mm large handled rake comb, wet/thick hair, coarse

title: Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Day Cream, 1-Fluid Ounce
description: For dry skin. This rich, rejuvenating day cream, with organic rosehip seed oil blended with essential fatty acids and antioxidant, helps stimulate your skin’s natural growth process and protect your skin from dryness—all to soften fine lines and counter the first signs of aging. With preserved elasticity and vitality your skin feels nourished, smooth and beautifully radiant, while your senses are harmonized with the delicate fragrance of fresh, organic roses.
